title: Police investigate Monday night shooting
content:
According to River Falls Police Chief Gordie Young, the boy shot himself in the thigh when a .22 semi-automatic handgun in his pocket discharged.
Young said the gun’s been recovered and there’s no danger to the community.
The boy was taken to Region’s Hospital in St. Paul. His medical status is unknown.
Young said police are still investigating the case and that “charges may be forthcoming.”
Anyone with information on the shooting is asked to contact police at 715-425-0909.
